mapper.select: SELECT A.REPORT_REPLY_NO, A.M_NO, A.BD_NO, A.RE_NO, A.NAME, A.BD_TITLE, A.REPORT_REASON, A.REPORT_DATE, B.RE_CONTENT FROM REPORT_REPLY A JOIN REPLY B ON A.RE_NO=B.RE_NO ORDER BY REPORT_REPLY_NO DESC

SELECT A.REPORT_REPLY_NO, A.NAME, A.BD_TITLE, C.RE_CONTENT, A.REPORT_REASON, A.REPORT_DATE, B.M_NICKNAME FROM REPORT_REPLY A LEFT JOIN IT_MEMBER B ON A.M_NO=B.M_NO LEFT JOIN REPLY C ON A.RE_NO=C.RE_NO WHERE A.REPORT_REPLY_NO=#{report_reply_no}

SELECT A.RE_NO, A.BD_NO, D.NAME, C.BD_TITLE, A.RE_CONTENT, A.M_NO FROM REPLY A INNER JOIN IT_MEMBER B ON A.M_NO= B.M_NO INNER JOIN BOARD C ON A.BD_NO=C.BD_NO INNER JOIN BOARDCATEGORY D ON C.BC_CODE=D.CODE WHERE A.RE_NO=#{re_no}
